article_title: Why Smart CEOs -- Whatever Their Industry -- Compete With Uber and Amazon

article_metadata.author: Forbes Insights

og.description: The concern about staying relevant is running high among U.S. CEOs, as noted in the recent report from Forbes Insights and KPMG, "Setting the Course for Growth: CEO Perspectives." The majority (72%) worry about the relevance of their products three years from now, are concerned about current competitors taking business [...]
